thread.title: Great Hotel for a Couple Nights
thread.title_full: Great Hotel for a Couple Nights - Review of Comfort Inn Lower East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TryingEverything1234
title: Great Hotel for a Couple Nights
text: Heads up, this is located in Chinatown. Not that it bothered us, but just to let you know. We stayed on a room with two beds and a TV with many channels. My kids definitely did not spend the time in the hotel too bored. Everything was clean, great bathroom, nice carpet, spotless sheets, and etc. The breakfast wasn't anything special, so we didn't eat much here, but still a great place.
